name: Elena Volkov
interest: Security Engineer focused on application security and penetration testing

jobs.description: Implemented security controls protecting 1M+ user accounts and $100M+ in transactions

projects.title: OAuth 2.0 Implementation

insights.description: Reduced account takeover attempts by 85% through MFA

Security requirement: System must encrypt all PII at rest using AES-256, in transit using TLS 1.3, with key rotation every 90 days
